thread.title: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned
thread.title_full: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned

title: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned
text:
> International Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned Outgoing FIFA President Sepp Blatter sits in the back of a car as he leaves the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct 8, 2015, after he was provisionally banned for 90 days by FIFA ethics committee. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
